title: You're Such a PIONEER ...
body_text:
DODGEBALL CXXXVII Main Event:
DIBUCCIO vs. MULLINS
The first woman of dodgeball
Diana DiBuccio
takes on the year's newest sensation
Michelle Mullins
at this 137th spectacular. Aside from their female features, these titans if you will have virtually nothing in common.
DiBuccio
... an over-bearing loud-mouth, once the self-appointed league "referee" - the "Ghetta Superstar"
Mullins
... a silent, deadly assassin, and member of the famed Team WALL army - the newest pioneer in the women's rights movement
It should be very interesting to see how things play out during this three-hour showdown. Come on out May 10 to see exactly what happens!
Don't Forget!
There will be a blockbuster announcement concerning the ginormous Season 14 Finale, DODGEBALL CXL! Make sure you're listening because it all goes "further" than you think!
body_html:
DODGEBALL CXXXVII Main Event:
DIBUCCIO vs. MULLINS

The first woman of dodgeball Diana DiBuccio takes on the year's newest sensation Michelle Mullins at this 137th spectacular. Aside from their female features, these titans if you will have virtually nothing in common.

DiBuccio ... an over-bearing loud-mouth, once the self-appointed league "referee" - the "Ghetta Superstar"
Mullins ... a silent, deadly assassin, and member of the famed Team WALL army - the newest pioneer in the women's rights movement

It should be very interesting to see how things play out during this three-hour showdown. Come on out May 10 to see exactly what happens!

Don't Forget!
